description: This file defines a MapFragment class, which is a UI component for displaying a map and related information in an Android application. It inflates a layout resource and sets some placeholder texts for map display and location features.

classes.name: MapFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays a map placeholder and some location information in an Android app.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment map layout for the UI.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets placeholder texts for map description and location features once the view is created.
